document_data.name: ''Longsword of the Righteous''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Longsword of the righteous''''' was a [[longsword]] enchanted to be especially effective against [[undead]] creatures.
document_data.Powers: ''Longsword of the righteous'' was an imposing and severe-looking weapon, blessed with ''divine'' holy magics. The sword turned undead creatures struck by it to dust. Additionally, this blade enhanced a [[paladin]]'s divine spellcasting abilities.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Dragonbait]]: a [[saurial]] paladin and a one-time companion of [[Artus Cimber]] during their foray into the jungles of [[Chult]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
